net.edzard.kinetic

Class RadialGradientFillStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.edzard.kinetic.GradientFillStyle
      • net.edzard.kinetic.LinearGradientFillStyle
        • net.edzard.kinetic.RadialGradientFillStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FillStyle

    public class RadialGradientFillStyle
extends LinearGradientFillStyle
    Radial gradient fill style. Radial gradients define a colour transition between two circles.
    Author:
    Ed
